ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] While waiting on Ester...
ygData.msgSnippet: Considering my well-balanced scimitar (yech!) is 8.5 lbs, I d love to find one.  I haven t had a decent 1HS weapon in ages. Kit ... From: Ioshua
ygData.messageBody:
Considering my well-balanced scimitar (yech!) is 8.5 lbs, I'd love to find
one. I haven't had a decent 1HS weapon in ages.

Kit

-----Original Message-----
From: Ioshua [mailto:Ioshua@...]
Sent: Wednesday, August 23, 2000 2:40 PM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] While waiting on Ester...


I almost picked one of those up once. Have you looked at the weight?
8.0! I lose it all with an ebw(primary) and an ebm(off) when fighting
decent length fights. Sure we've got Jig but wouldn't an 8lb block of
lead suck it down so fast we might as well add it to the combat twist?

Ninev Rudeflute
38 1/2 and heading to get his own Shrunken Gobbo Head earring tonight
E'ci

--- Bill Mann <dabard@...> wrote:
> A guildbro happened upon a nifty find on a merchant in FV the other
> night: a Gleaming Shortsword. This lil beauty is 10/29, 1H Slash
> (duh!) and +5 Cha.
> And for 450pp, it was mine :o)
> Come to find out it comes off of some Squire Something or other in
> Trak.
> I'm a happy bard :o)
>
> -=B=-
> 40.6
> The Rathe
